message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both us and you. This exceptional item is worth $1000000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at this exclusive price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a valuable asset but also to benefit from a favorable deal compared to its market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
